likedText:
Beautiful historic hotel in the heart of our favourite French city 

Staff are extremely attentive and Remy did everything he could to help make this another special stay
dislikedText: Gum doesn’t have weights - website suggests otherwise.  TV didn’t work but staff came to fix it immediately.
reviewTitle: Tasteful luxury in the heart of Lyon

likedText: Super building very beautiful and an amazing refurb
dislikedText: Not the hotels fault as it is very old, but very difficult to navigate.
reviewTitle: Amazing place to stay in Lyon
propertyResponse:
Hello Barry,

Thank you very much for your excellent feedback and overall rating! We are delighted that you enjoyed the beauty of Cour des Loges  and the renovation.
 It is a pleasure to see that it helped make your stay in Lyon memorable.

We understand that the layout of the building can sometimes be a little confusing, especially in a historic structure like ours. 

We are doing our best to improve signage and orientation, while respecting the old-world charm of the place.

Thank you again for your trust, and we hope to welcome you back on your next visit to Lyon.

Kind regards,
Rémi 
Guest relation

likedText: Location, lovely bar and staff were excellent especially the barman and Remi
reviewTitle: Wonderful night enroute to the south of France.communication from the hotel was especially as Ileft something behind whi
propertyResponse:
Dear Paul,

Thank you so much for your kind words! 

We're thrilled you had a wonderful night on your way south. 

It's great to hear you enjoyed the location, the bar, and especially the service from our team
 we'll be sure to pass on your compliments to the barman.

I am glad to have welcomed you and we will be please to see  you back to Cour des Loges soon!

Rémi 

Guest relation

dislikedText: The rooms are tiny and windows don’t open. It smelled humid and made us feel uncomfortable as it wasn’t possible to take fresh air inside the room.  The hotel is nice but is inside a very narrow road so there wasn’t enough light and windows are facing walls.
propertyResponse:
Dear guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are sorry to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations, particularly with regard to the size of the room, ventilation and brightness.

Our rooms are designed to offer a functional and comfortable space, but we understand that this may seem cramped to some. Regarding the windows, some rooms do indeed have windows that do not open, for safety reasons or due to the building's configuration, but we also have other options available on request, subject to availability.

We also take note of your comments about the smell and ventilation, and have already passed this on to our technical team for a thorough check. Finally, our city centre location may indeed mean narrower streets, but it also allows quick access to the main sites of interest.

Please do not hesitate to contact reception upon arrival so that we can find a suitable solution.

We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back, in a room that better meets your expectations.

Kind regards,

Rémi

likedText: Beautifully restored court in the very heart of Lyon. Just opened up after the renovations.
dislikedText: Not a huge detractor once you do it once but a bit complicated to reach by car. Maybe better directions would help.
propertyResponse:
Dear Natalia,

Thank you very much for your kind review and for sharing your experience following your stay at Cour des Loges Lyon.

We’re delighted to hear that you appreciated the beauty of our recently restored historic property and its unique location in the heart of Lyon. It means a great deal to us, especially just after reopening.

We also take good note of your feedback regarding access by car. We understand it can be a bit tricky in the old town, and we’re currently working on improving our directions and communication to make arrivals smoother for all our guests.

We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back very soon for another memorable stay in Lyon.

Warm regards,
Rémi
Guest Relation
Cour des Loges Lyon

likedText: Great location and good air conditioning! The staff was mostly outstanding, especially the lady in the breakfast room and the concierge.
dislikedText: The newly remodeled rooms were too modern and somewhat sterile. I was expecting old world charm and they made it look like any modern hotel. Also, the tv went out and the staff seemed unable to fix it and a bit dismissive. They did credit our breakfasts but not having the tv was disappointing.
propertyResponse:
Dear Nancy,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your recent stay with us in Cour des Loges Lyon. 

We're delighted to hear that you appreciated our central location and the comfort of our air conditionining.

It's also wonderful to know that several members of our team, particularly the lady in the breakfast room and our concierge, made a positive impression on you.

We regret that the style of our newly renovated rooms did not meet your expectations. While we have embraced a more contemporary design for comfort and functionality, we understand that you were hoping for more traditional charm, and we appreciate your perspective.

We’re truly sorry for the inconvenience caused by the television issue and the way it was handled. This is certainly not the level of service we strive to provide, and your comments have been shared with the relevant teams to ensure we improve in this area.

We do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future and provide a stay more aligned with your expectations.

Warm regards,

Rémi

Dear Inge,

A huge thank you for your perfect rating and such positive feedback! 🌟
We are delighted that you enjoyed our service and breakfast. Your satisfaction is the greatest reward for our team, who strive every day to offer our guests an impeccable experience.

It was a pleasure to welcome you, and we hope to have the pleasure of seeing you again very soon!

Kind regards,

Rémi
Guest relation supervisor

likedText:
service excellent
personnel de haute qualité et d'une extrême gentillesse.
Restaurant de haut niveau
reviewTitle: séjour magnifique dans un hotel plein de raffinement.
propertyResponse:
Bonjour Jean-François,
Nous vous remercions pour votre très gentil message faisant suite à votre récente venue à Cour des Loges. L'accueil, la gentillesse et la satisfaction de nos clients sont aux coeur de nos priorité. Permettez-moi de partager votre avis à nos équipes. Nous espérons vous accueillir à nouveau dans le futur,
Très cordialement,
Rémi
Réception

likedText: Personnel très professionnel. Rémi en particulier, dévoué et attentionné. Digne des plus grands hotels.
dislikedText: Malheureusement très bruyant, la musique toute la nuit dans le Lobby / Patio est une erreur qui empêche le sommeil des résidents de l'hotel
propertyResponse:
Bonjour Mathias,
Je viens de prendre connaissance de votre message et tiens à vous présenter toutes mes excuses pour la musique qui vous a perturbé.
Soyez assuré que nous faisons le nécessaire pour qu'une telle situation ne se reproduise plus.
Aussi, nous sommes en réception et conciergerie à votre disposition 24h/24 pour vous trouver la meilleure solution possible. 
J'espère que nous aurons l'occasion de vous accueillir à nouveau.
N'hésitez pas à contacter Marie Fabre, notre responsable des réservations, qui fera de son mieux pour vous trouver une chambre qui puisse pleinement vous convenir. 
De mon côté, j'ai été ravi de vous accueillir et je vous adresse mes meilleures salutations,
Très cordialement,
Rémi

likedText: La gentillesse et l’attention du personnel même avec nos chiens
propertyResponse:
Dear Lauren,

Thank you very much for your kind words. We are glad you did enjoyed your stay with us,
Looking forward meeting you again soon,
Kindest regards,
Rémi
Guest relation
